ValidationRule.description: Makes the incident number field mandatory if certain items are selected from the Technical Issue picklist
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Technical_Issue__c,"Web Error At Payment Stage (IN Needed)"), ISPICKVAL(Technical_Issue__c,"Refund Option Not Offered When It Should Have Been (IN Needed)"), ISPICKVAL(Technical_Issue__c,"Web Error During Booking Path (IN Needed)"), ISPICKVAL(Technical_Issue__c,"Web Error During Exchange Path (IN Needed)"), ISPICKVAL(Technical_Issue__c,"Web Error During Refund (IN Needed)"), ISPICKVAL(Technical_Issue__c,"Web Error When Trying To Claim (IN Needed)"), ISPICKVAL(Technical_Issue__c,"Website Down Completely (IN Needed)") ) && ISBLANK(Error_Message_Incident_Number__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add an incident number to the "Incident Number" field to proceed. If there is no Incident Number available then please enter the error message instead
